result.title: OPEIU and CWA Call on Synchrony Financial To Disclose Material Relationships Compromising Director Independence
result.text: New York, NY, Oct. 14, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The Office and Professional Employees International Union (OPEIU) and the Communications Workers of America (CWA) union filed complaints with the Securities and Exchange Commission, the New York Stock Exchange, and the New York Attorney General over the failure by Synchrony Financial to disclose a material relationship that compromised the independence of one of its Directors and Audit Committee members, Paget Alves, in contravention of New York Stock Exchange rules on director independence.
